name: Homerun Hitters
description:
Step up to the plate in Homerun Hitters. Play solo or against a friend as you launch fastballs, curveballs, shoots and more! Head out to the ballpark and choose from 4 teams and play up to 9 inning in this fun back to basics baseball game.

Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.

Download Homerun Hitters today!



"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
